data.text: @MitrakarR Aisi baate mostly Pakistani hi krte hh..... Anyway, it's geopolitics

@MitrakarR It's naturally he'll not support Russia in this war. So please don't criticise him according to your perception. One country is enemy for them and that country is friend of our. It's just vision and pov 🙂

@MitrakarR Come on man, IDK why you're running behind Hananya. When Israel attacks Syrian forces and captured Golan heights, Russia was the 1st country who called them fascist. And still the entire territory isn't recognised by the Russia, especially the Golan heights.
@MitrakarR Jew jew bhai bhai isliye support kar raha hai wo
